languages.text: "Я собираю лишь самых близких мне людей, тех, чей образ заставляет сердце петь, глаза увлажняться, а уста расцветать хвалой Великому. Впрочем, это не значит, что среди них вы не увидите воров или контрабандистов. Преимущественно — именно их".

"Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."
languages.original_text: "Я собираю лишь самых близких мне людей, тех, чей образ заставляет сердце петь, глаза увлажняться, а уста расцветать хвалой Великому. Впрочем, это не значит, что среди них вы не увидите воров или контрабандистов. Преимущественно — именно их".

traits.locale_text: "Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."

"Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."

"Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."

"Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."

languages.text: “我只会邀请那些我最亲近的人。每当看到他们的面容，我都会心潮澎湃，双目熠熠生辉，口中情不自禁地赞美着至高无上的神皇。当然，我并不是说你不会遇到走私者或窃贼。老实说，参加聚会的绝大部分都是这两种人。”
languages.original_text: "Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."

traits.locale_text: “我只会邀请那些我最亲近的人。每当看到他们的面容，我都会心潮澎湃，双目熠熠生辉，口中情不自禁地赞美着至高无上的神皇。当然，我并不是说你不会遇到走私者或窃贼。老实说，参加聚会的绝大部分都是这两种人。”

languages.text: 「招待されるのは、あたしに一番近しくて、親しい人…その容貌があたしの心を歌わせ、目を輝かせ、唇にエグザルテッド・ワンへの賛美の花を咲かせる人。その中に泥棒や密輸人がいないとは言わないさ。実際、大多数はそういう人間さ」
languages.original_text: "Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."

traits.locale_text: 「招待されるのは、あたしに一番近しくて、親しい人…その容貌があたしの心を歌わせ、目を輝かせ、唇にエグザルテッド・ワンへの賛美の花を咲かせる人。その中に泥棒や密輸人がいないとは言わないさ。実際、大多数はそういう人間さ」

languages.text: «Solo mis seres más queridos y cercanos están invitados: gente cuya vista hace que mi corazón cante, mis ojos lagrimeen y mis labios entonen alabanzas al Exaltado. Eso no significa que no encontrará entre ellos a ladrones y contrabandistas. A decir verdad, son mayoría».
languages.original_text: "Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."

traits.locale_text: «Solo mis seres más queridos y cercanos están invitados: gente cuya vista hace que mi corazón cante, mis ojos lagrimeen y mis labios entonen alabanzas al Exaltado. Eso no significa que no encontrará entre ellos a ladrones y contrabandistas. A decir verdad, son mayoría».

languages.text: « Je n'ai invité que les gens qui me sont les plus proches ; ceux dont le visage me fait chanter le cœur, briller les yeux et ouvrir les lèvres pour louer l'Exalté. Ce qui ne veut pas dire que vous ne croiserez ni voleurs ni contrebandiers... Ce sera même la majorité de l'assemblée. »
languages.original_text: "Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai invité que les gens qui me sont les plus proches ; ceux dont le visage me fait chanter le cœur, briller les yeux et ouvrir les lèvres pour louer l'Exalté. Ce qui ne veut pas dire que vous ne croiserez ni voleurs ni contrebandiers... Ce sera même la majorité de l'assemblée. »

languages.text: "Ich habe nur meine Liebsten eingeladen – Menschen, deren Anblick mein Herz zum Singen bringt, meine Augen zum Glänzen und meine Lippen mit Lobpreisungen des Erhabenen erstrahlen lässt. Das heißt natürlich nicht, dass sich darunter keine Diebe oder Schmuggler befinden werden. Genau genommen werden fast nur Diebe und Schmuggler kommen."
languages.original_text: "Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe nur meine Liebsten eingeladen – Menschen, deren Anblick mein Herz zum Singen bringt, meine Augen zum Glänzen und meine Lippen mit Lobpreisungen des Erhabenen erstrahlen lässt. Das heißt natürlich nicht, dass sich darunter keine Diebe oder Schmuggler befinden werden. Genau genommen werden fast nur Diebe und Schmuggler kommen."

languages.text: "Sadece en yakınlarım ve en sevdiklerim davetli. Sırf görmek bile kalbimin şarkılar söylemesine, gözlerimin ışıldamasına ve dudaklarımın Görkemli'ye dizilen methiyelerle dolmasına sebep olan insanlar. Tabii bu demek değil ki onların arasında hırsızlar veya kaçakçılarla karşılaşmayacaksın. Çoğunluğu öyle aslına bakarsan."
languages.original_text: "Only my nearest and dearest are invited — people whose visage makes my heart sing, my eyes glisten, and my lips bloom with praises for the Exalted One. That's not to say that you won't encounter thieves or smugglers among them. They make up the majority, in fact."

traits.locale_text: "Sadece en yakınlarım ve en sevdiklerim davetli. Sırf görmek bile kalbimin şarkılar söylemesine, gözlerimin ışıldamasına ve dudaklarımın Görkemli'ye dizilen methiyelerle dolmasına sebep olan insanlar. Tabii bu demek değil ki onların arasında hırsızlar veya kaçakçılarla karşılaşmayacaksın. Çoğunluğu öyle aslına bakarsan."
